original_query: SELECT MIN(p.Id) FROM posts as p, tags as t, votes as v WHERE p.Id = t.ExcerptPostId AND p.OwnerUserId = v.UserId AND p.CreationDate>=CAST('2010-07-20 02:01:05' AS TIMESTAMP)
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM posts AS posts WHERE posts.CreationDate >= TIMESTAMP '2010-07-20 02:01:05'
CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT * FROM votes AS votes
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E3 AS SELECT * FROM E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3 WHERE E1.OwnerUserId=E3.UserId)
CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM tags AS tags
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E3E2 AS SELECT MIN(Id) AS EXPR$0 FROM E1E3 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2 WHERE E1E3.Id=E2.ExcerptPostId)
